channel.title: Unity on Christian Martínez De La Rosa
channel.description: Recent content in Unity on Christian Martínez De La Rosa

item.title: Pokétch
item.description: Pokétch Unity is a recreation of the Pokétch device from Pokémon Platinum, developed in Unity with all the original functionalities plus new features. This project is focused on delivering a smooth experience on Android devices.

item.title: Boxing AR
item.description: Control a boxing robot and achieve the RoboBoxing glory!

item.title: Empty Universe
item.description:
Empty Universe is an exhaustic adventure where you will have to defend the ship of enemies. You will have three types of astronauts in your control. Each astronaut has his own job in order to get all ship needs covered.

Survive five days and nights to win. Don’t let the enemies kill your astronauts and manage your resources well.

item.title: Fishing Trash
item.description: A GameJam with ‘sea’ and ‘garbage’ as the theme.
